creditline: Gift of Richard Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: red background with overall design made up of white, tan, and green dots; 2 edges unfinished, 2 edges have lime green trim attached, covered with gold scrolling trim; metallic trim in a vertical strip at center
title: Odhani (Woman's Head Shawl)
